Connect

Arctic Securities

For both chess players and investors alike, precision is essential and mistakes can be fatal. Arctic Securities is a leading, independent Norwegian investment bank, specializing in corporate finance transactions and advisory services, securities sales and trading, as well as equity and credit research. I respect Arctic Securities’ absolute commitment to integrity, quality and independent research achievements. They focus on competence, discretion and rapid execution – their core competitive advantages.

Simonsen Vogt Wiig

Simonsen Vogt Wiig has assisted me with legal advice since I was thirteen – and they continue to today. When they told me that one of their sayings was “failure is not an option” it reminded me of the words of my former coach Garry Kasparov – “losing is not an option”. Advokatfirmaet Simonsen Vogt Wiig is one of the leading law firms in Norway. With approximately 170 lawyers and offices in Oslo, Bergen, Trondheim, Kristiansand, Stavanger and Tromsø they are well represented locally. Simonsen Vogt Wiig provides professional legal assistance within all aspects of the business law. Their clients includes Norwegian and foreign corporations, institutions, organizations, individuals as well as government.
